titleStmt.title: Several acts and laws passed by the great and general court or assembly of Their Majesties province of Massachusetts-Bay in New England. Convened and held at Boston, the eighth day of June. 1692. Anno Regni Gulielmi, et Mariæ, Regis et Reginæ Angliæ, Scotiæ, Franciæ, et Hiberniæ, quarto
Public General Acts. 1692.
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Benjamin Harris, printer to His Excellency, the Governour and Council,

notesStmt.note: Pages have print show-through, with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
